VoiceList.Entry: “Everyone here's a Ghost of the Gi tribe, killed in a certain battle.”
Bugenhagen “The vengeful spirits of the Gi didn't disappear,and couldn't return to the Lifestream…”
“We still have far to go. Ho Ho Hoooo.”
Bugenhagen “This cave leads to the back of Cosmo Canyon.”
Bugenhagen “If we had been attacked by the Gi here, we wouldn't have stood a chance.”
Cloud “This is a strange looking rock…” Break it open Leave it alone
Cloud “Funny looking rock…” Break it open Leave it as is
Cloud “An odd shaped rock…” Break it open Leave it as is
Cloud “A strange shaped rock…” Break it open Leave it as is
